Description: Read-only system name. Use Custom Name to modify.
Read-only Color Name (for Light Theme). Use Custom Name (for Light Theme) to modify.
Override for the Default Name (for Light Theme). Should be short and descriptive.
Read-only default Chart color (for Light Theme). Use Custom Color (for Light Theme) to override.
Override for chart Default Color (for Light Theme). Enter as a Hex value or select a color from the status grid in the right panel.
Read-only Color Name (for Dark Theme). Use Custom Name (for Dark Theme) to modify.
Override for the Default Name (for Dark Theme). Should be short and descriptive.
Read-only default Chart color (for Dark Theme). Use Custom Color (for Dark Theme) to override.
Override for chart Default Color (for Dark Theme). Enter as a Hex value or select a color from the status grid in the right panel.
